EA-News.Title: Celebrating a Milestone Year for EA SPORTS
EA-News.Text: It’s been a huge year for EA SPORTS, and we’re reflecting on some of our biggest achievements and efforts across our games, communities, and teams as we head into the New Year.

EA-News.Title: Electronic Arts Named to Several ‘Best Places to Work’ Lists
EA-News.Text: Electronic Arts has been recognized for several achievements in workplace excellence.

EA-News.Title: Electronic Arts Continues to Move Inclusive Gaming Forward
EA-News.Text: EA open sources photosensitivity tool IRIS and adds four additional patents to its accessibility patent pledge.
